name: Loopindex
description:
It's time to explore the virtual land of Loopindex!

Its vast, uncharted lands are full of puzzles to solve! Play alone, or team up with a robo-friend, and use logic and timing to clear each area.
The difficulty will test your ingenuity as you explore the unique “loop mechanic” at the core of the gameplay loop.

You’ll take on levels full of traps and discovery, befriend virtual creatures, and even battle against cool bosses.

Features:

  • More than 70 levels
  • Challenging boss fights
  • Get help from robo-pets to complete the levels
  • Multiplayer co-op for two players
  • Unique "loop command" mechanic
